## 4.0.3 Bug Fixes
- Fixed XML docs not included in NuGet leading to no intellesense. (Closes #44)
- Fixed RawTexture.Height property being internal by making it public (Closes #45)

## 4.0.3 Bug Fixes
- Fixed crash in `TextureAtlas.FromRaw` where loop for slices used incorrect iterator. (Closes #52)

## 4.1.0
- Added `AsepriteFileReader.Read(Stream)` method to supported reading Aseprite file with `TitleContainer` stream. (PR #47) (Closes #49)
- Added  `SpriteContentProcessor`, `SpriteContentTypeWriter`, and `SpriteContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
- Added `TextureAtlasContentProcessor`, `TextureAtlasContentTypeWriter` and `TextureAtlasContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
- Added `SpriteSheetContentProcessor`, `SpriteSheetContentTypeWriter` and `SpriteSheetContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
- Added `TilesetContentProcessor`, `TilesetContentTypeWriter` and `TilesetContentContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
- Added `TilemapContentProcessor`, `TilemapContentTypeWriter` and `TilemapContentContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
- added `AnimatedTilemapContentProcessor`, `AnimatedTilemapContentTypeWriter` and `AnimatedTilemapContentTypeReader` (PR #50)
